name: PublishExtension
description: Publishes a VSTS/TFS extension with TFS Cross Platform Command Line Interface (tfx)
author: Microsoft Corporation
helpMarkDown: Replace with markdown to show in help

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: Gallery Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Gallery generic endpoint, set the key 'Password/Token Key' field with a Personal Access Token

inputs.name: publisher
inputs.label: Publisher
inputs.helpMarkDown: Extension publisher. If not specifified it will be used the publisher in VSIX/manifest file.

inputs.name: rootFolder
inputs.label: Root manifests folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Root folder from which the manifests are searched

inputs.name: patternManifest
inputs.label: Manifest file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the pattern for manifest files to join

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Current working directory when tfx is run. Defaults to the folder where the manifest is located.
